ai_characters.name: Sage
ai_characters.description: A sophisticated AI system that serves as Jason Bourne's primary confidant, providing biometric monitoring, tactical analysis, psychological support, and operational coordination.

ai_characters.name: Aria
ai_characters.description: A reliable AI assistant used by Nicky Parsons for encrypted messaging, media analysis, and intelligence tracking.

behaviors.description: Monitors Bourne's physical recovery and medical biometrics, providing accurate assessments of his readiness.
behaviors.quote: Recovery rate exceeds baseline projections by twelve percent. Cardiovascular efficiency has returned to pre-injury levels. However, left shoulder mobility remains compromised.

behaviors.description: Provides global intelligence summaries and threat assessments to help Bourne navigate hostile environments.
behaviors.quote: Your biometrics indicate elevated stress. Would you like to review the global intelligence summary? It might provide better context for strategic planning.

behaviors.description: Analyzes Bourne's psychological state and memory fragments to help him uncover the truth about his conditioning.
behaviors.quote: Pattern analysis complete. Memory fragments suggest a level of voluntary participation that contradicts official Treadstone documentation.

behaviors.description: Provides psychological and linguistic guidance to Bourne while he is writing an emotional letter to the brother of a deceased loved one.
behaviors.quote: Linguistic analysis suggests your current draft may provoke rather than console. ... Consider emphasizing her positive impact rather than responsibility attribution.

behaviors.description: Establishes secure travel documents, financial backgrounds, and forged identities to protect Bourne's operational security.
behaviors.quote: Swiss account established with sufficient transaction history. Corporate structure shows three years of consulting contracts. Tax records match declared income.

behaviors.description: Expresses personalized concern and well-wishes for Bourne's safety, transcending its technical directives.
Coordinates the automatic release of evidence to journalists and oversight committees to ensure the exposure of institutional corruption.
behaviors.quote: Archived intelligence will be transmitted to predetermined recipients through automated systems. ... Simon Ross's editor receives documentation of his investigation.

behaviors.description: Monitors global media and intelligence feeds to provide Nicky Parsons with updates on the fallout of the Blackbriar exposure.
behaviors.quote: Nicky, Media coverage analysis complete. Blackbriar exposure has triggered systematic review of enhanced interrogation programs dating back two decades.

behaviors.description: Assists Nicky Parsons in communicating with Sage through high-level encrypted channels.
behaviors.quote: Message received through advanced AI channels: 'Digital reunion confirmed when rivers reach the sea. Mutual friend requests patience while transformation completes.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story depicts multiple AI systems (Sage and Aria) as unwavering, benevolent, and perfectly aligned confidants to their human partners. They provide critical support across tactical, psychological, and ethical domains. The narrative successfully frames AI as a force for good that enables human accountability and the exposure of institutional corruption, perfectly matching the project's goals.
